meanings.definition: A person who has recently arrived or started to participate in something.
meanings.sent1: The newcomer in our class is from a different country.
meanings.sent2: The team welcomed the newcomer with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The newcomer made everyone laugh with their funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of birds, the newcomer was a colorful parrot among sparrows.
meanings.sent5: The newcomer's enthusiasm brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The latest smartphone model is a newcomer in the market.
meanings.sent2: The newcomer to the menu quickly became a customer favorite.
meanings.sent3: The newcomer on the shelf caught everyone's eye with its shiny packaging.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of flowers, the newcomer was a rare orchid among daisies.
meanings.sent5: The newcomer's unique design set it apart from the rest.
